alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Custer; Dewey; Major; Roger Mills (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 2:42AM CDT until August 08 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Roger Mills County in western Oklahoma... Northern Custer County in western Oklahoma... Northwestern Blaine County in northwestern Oklahoma... Dewey County in northwestern Oklahoma... South central Major County in northwestern Oklahoma... * Until 330 AM CDT. * At 242 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Longdale to 3 miles south of Taloga to 6 miles north of Leedey, moving south at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Taloga, Thomas, Seiling, Vici, Canton, Leedey, Longdale, Camargo, Oakwood, Putnam, Canton Lake, Moorewood, Eagle City, Cestos, Fay, and Hucmac. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Custer; Dewey; Major; Roger Mills
